query:
select
                drone.id
            from node
            left join drone
            on node.id = drone.id
            where
                drone.ready = true
                and controller is not null
                and cluster = $1
                and now() - last_heartbeat < $2
                and draining = false
            order by (
                select
                    count(*)
                from backend
                where drone_id = node.id
                and last_status != 'Terminated'
            ) asc, random()
            limit 1
